attributes.action: free care for elderly, disabled persons over 65 and stop vicious finance depatments from having too much power
attributes.additional_details:
I want this Government to sit up and listen regarding pensioners living off welfare benefits.
We need free care and for for Finance departments of local Councils to mind their own business regarding our benefits.
If we have to contribute to our care needs then it must be capped at £15 per week not the high demands which we cannot afford.
I want the government to give free care to the elderly disabled pensioners
I want restrictions on what we contribute towards care of £15
Finance departments to be monitored more closely to ensure these restrictions take place and those who suffered injustice be compensated
